api_auth.description: The security definitions for this API. Please check individual operations for applicable scopes.

scopes.https://api.ebay.com/oauth/api_scope/sel: View and manage your payment and order information to display this information to you and allow you to initiate refunds using the third party application
View and manage your order fulfillments
View and manage disputes and related details (including payment and order information).

apiDescription: Use the Fulfillment API to complete the process of packaging, addressing, handling, and shipping each order on behalf of the seller, in accordance with the payment method and timing specified at checkout.
